chess

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract piece class.
    Author:
    Andrew Wang, Rumzi Tadros

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean moved
      Boolean, refers to if a piece has moved or not.
      protected Player player
      Player, the owner of the piece
      protected int space
      Piece's position on board (integer id)
      protected int uniqueID
      Int, refers to where player stores the piece

    • Method Detail

      • validMoves

        public abstract Move[] validMoves(Board b)
        Abstract method (implemented per piece) to generate the valid moves the piece can make.
        Parameters:
        b - The board that the piece is on.
        Returns:
        Array of Move objects

      • hasMoved

        public boolean hasMoved()
        Method to see if a piece has been moved. Used for Castling, Pawn 2 step.
        Returns:
        True if moved, false if not.

      • pieceMoved

        public void pieceMoved()
        Method to set the moved boolean of a piece to true

        public boolean getColor()
        Method to find get the owner of the piece (and his color)
        Returns:
        Boolean color

        public int getID()
        Method to get the ID of a piece
        Returns:
        int for ID

      • getSpace

        public int getSpace()
        Method to find the position of a piece
        Returns:
        int The space number

      • occupy

        public void occupy(int s)
        Changes position of the piece
        Parameters:
        s - The space number for the piece to move to

      • onBoard

        public static boolean onBoard(int space)
        Method to make sure the input is legal (actually goes to a board space)
        Parameters:
        space - The space to check legality
        Returns:
        Boolean - true for on board, false if not

      • isLeftBorder

        public static boolean isLeftBorder(int space)
        Method to check if a space is on the left border of the board.
        Parameters:
        space - The space to check
        Returns:
        Boolean - true if space is on left border

      • isRightBorder

        public static boolean isRightBorder(int space)
        Method to check if a space is on the right border of the board.
        Parameters:
        space - The space to check
        Returns:
        Boolean - true if space is on right border

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method to convert the piece into the String value to print. Overriden in individual piece classes to add type
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String title of piece (e.g: bR)
